name: libra/zendframework-codeless
description: Zend Framework 2 dummy repo to low disk space by using zf2 as global library, as example in dir: /usr/share/php/Zendframework

suggest.pecl-weakref: Implementation of weak references for Zend\Stdlib\CallbackHandler
suggest.zendframework/zendpdf: ZendPdf for creating PDF representations of barcodes
suggest.zendframework/zendservice-recaptcha: ZendService\ReCaptcha for rendering ReCaptchas in Zend\Captcha and/or Zend\Form
